item.title: Talks and Workshops
item.description: 2023 Launch and Environment Constraints Deep Dive (MacSysAdmin) Presentation 2022 20+ New Ways to Bypass Your macOS Privacy Mechanisms (BlackHat EU) Presentation Video macOS Vulnerabilities Hiding in Plain Sight (BlackHat Asia, Troopers, Zer0Con) Presentation Whitepaper Video The Achilles Heel of Endpoint Security (Objective By The Sea, MacSysAdmin) Presentation Video Beyond the Good Ol’ LaunchAgents (SecurityFest, MacDevOpsYVR, BSidesBudapest) Presentation Video 2021 Mount(ain) of Bugs (Objective By The Sea, Hacktivity) Presentation Video
